post.body: I'm off to bed. Could you please DM and explain the error and I'll take a look tomorrow?
What do you mean? I use Google Reader and it works fine.
I've done that before....I'm sure it's ok if you link to the video or give credits or something
I do it old school....w/ a tea kettle. As for my favorite kind, well I have no idea. I have so many different ones:)
I love tea.....it's awesome.
Nope. I'm being lazy:)
@DDrDark Real time saver w/ not having to take screenshots!
Yeah, I can't believe I just noticed that.....learn something new everyday:)
Ha:) I honestly never knew that. It's going to make things a lot easier.
Try opening color picker, hold down the eyedropper and move it onto another open app. I just did it and it worked!
being lazy today:).....now I actually have to start working!
I do that all the time too:)
Thanks!
Thanks, glad you like it.
Score.
Enjoy the rest of your day!
Thanks for the RTage! How's your day going?
That looks pretty awesome, I could certainly use that :)
Who doesn't?
Not yet, probably should start :)
That's pretty sweet!
Nice job!
Know anyone who is looking to hire, I need some jobs posted before I can launch
Nope. Inspiration post for tonight. I wanted something different so I went w/ package design.
Hi! That's a work in progress. I'm working on building a brand as a "parent" to Spoonfed. That site will be my portfolio soon!
Yeah, I've got a ton to do after vacation. Enjoy your day:)
Definitely! How are you doing?
Ha!
You're missing out. 2009 is pretty insane:)
The harder I try to go to bed early....the later I stay up. Huh.....Well off to bed (hopefully). G' night everyone!
Finished some slight design tweaks on Spoonfed. Changed sidebar backgrounds. What do you think? Anything else I should change?
Hmmm...maybe I need to write about this. Did anyone else know you could do that color selector trick?
You guys know you can get the PSD color selector to work on other applications....or am I just being very stupid?

Good night Twitter. Tomorrow is Friday. Nice.

I think it may be time for a spam filter. I got over 200 spam comments in just a few hours. What a pain.

Writing article called "Branding: Finding the Perfect Name"
Trying to think of a name for my new brand, but I got nothing. Now I'm going to write an article about naming your brand.

I can't stand people who sit on good domains. It makes branding so much harder.
